mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_DOCTOR_COMMENT (DOCTOR_COMMENT_NUMBER, DOCTOR_COMMENT_TEXT, MEDICAL_INFO_NUMBER, DOCTOR_NUMBER) VALUES (DOCTOR_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{doctorCommentText}, #{medicalInfoNumber}, #{doctorNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT c.DOCTOR_COMMENT_NUMBER, d.DOCTOR_NAME, c.DOCTOR_COMMENT_TEXT, c.MEDICAL_INFO_NUMBER FROM DT_DOCTOR_COMMENT c JOIN DT_DOCTOR d ON c.DOCTOR_NUMBER = d.DOCTOR_NUMBER WHERE c.MEDICAL_INFO_NUMBER = #{medicalInfoNumber}
